contest-event.event-date:
Jan. 29, 1984 D Rochdale Contest (Section A)
Rochdale Contest (Section A) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
rochdale-contest-section-a
None
Rochdale Town Hall, Rochdale, Greater Manchester, England, UK Hymn tune contest - 1st(£25 and trophy) Lockwood. Lockwood were runners-up for the seventh consecutive year. Prizes - 1st £250 and trophy, 2nd £150 and shield, 3rd £75 and trophy, 4th £50 and shield. 25th annual contest. 15 bands competed.
Aug. 20, 2014, 2:43 p.m. June 27, 2016, 11:10 a.m.
1 Rockingham Band Graham O'Connor
2 Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) Peter Kitson
3 Trafford Band Jeff Norris
